Uses of Class
com.example.ss7g7.stars.Student

    Methods in com.example.ss7g7.stars that return Student 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Student StarsDB.getStudent​(java.lang.String userName)
    This method retrieves a student based on a username, searches through the students data in the database linearly and returns the first result which corresponds to the student's username.
    Student StarsDB.getStudentByMatric​(java.lang.String matricNo)
    This method returns a student object with the corresponding matriculation number.

    java.util.ArrayList<Student> FileIO.updateStudentRecords​(Student currentStudent, java.lang.String mode)
    This method deletes or updates student records according to the parameter mode.
